education.area: Special Program in Science, Mathematics, Technology, and Environment

highlights: Prepared exercises and materials for students before each class.
Reviewed and provided feedback on student assignments.
Developed a Docker-based solution to run Vivado on macOS, improving accessibility for Mac users.
Designed lab exercises to support the new setup, enhancing the learning experience.
Managed finances and handled budgeting for events and activities within the group.

projects.name: ConDormHub
projects.description: A resident booking service developed for the Software Engineering II course. I led both frontend and backend development, ensuring performance and scalability, and managed deployment on cloud platforms.

projects.name: fund-oral-report
projects.description: A volunteer project designed to ease course progress tracking for students by replacing cumbersome Excel files.
The final project of the Programming Methodology I course. It's a Java GUI Tic-Tac-Toe game with three board sizes and LAN support for seamless client communication via sockets.
projects.name: SmallMediumLargeXO
vivado-mac

projects.name: notion-to-google-calendar
projects.description: A personal tool I created to sync my Notion database with Google Calendar, allowing for seamless integration and better time management.

projects.name: grader-dumper
